title: Rice On Trump, Jordan The Drunk GOAT 11.13.19
itunes:title: Rice On Trump, Jordan The Drunk GOAT 11.13.19
description:
In episode 515, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Mike Feeney to discuss some impeachment updates, GOP representative Peter King retiring, Uber CEO calling the murder of Khashoggi a mistake, a senior Trump official / scammer, a wild Michael Jordan story, the Sonic the Hedgehog redesign, being genetically wired to avoid certain vegetables, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Former U.S. top diplomat Rice concerned by shadow diplomacy on Ukraine
  2. Longtime GOP Rep. Peter King announces retirement
  3. Rep. Peter King: There are "too many mosques in this country”
  4. Uber CEO backtracks after calling Saudi murder of Khashoggi "a mistake"
  5. Senior Trump official embellished résumé, had face on fake Time cover
  6. Jeremy Roenick tells an absolutely epic Michael Jordan golf gambling story
  7. WATCH: When Michael Jordan and Charles Barkley Roasted Each Other on Oprah.
  8. Sonic the Hedgehog returns with bigger eyes and fewer teeth in new trailer
  9. Some people 'genetically wired' to avoid some vegetables
  10. WATCH: Pink Siifu - Pray Everyday

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
